title: [Gyldemar Forest, Rocky Trail]
description: Only white gravel marks the trail ahead.  The pure white of the gravel reflects the sunlight strongly, making it hard to watch where you walk.  Large white boulders mark the probable source of the gravel.  A family of sparrows has made their nest atop one of the boulders.

Only white gravel marks the trail ahead.  Moonlight gives the gravel a subtle glow.  Large white boulders mark the probable source of the gravel.  A family of sparrows has made their nest atop one of the boulders.
